# Chwalęcin, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Chwalęcin  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Orneta, within Lidzbark County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-west of Orneta,  west of Lidzbark Warmiński, and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
Before 1772 the area was part of Kingdom of Poland, and in 1772–1945 it belonged to Prussia and Germany (East Prussia).
